events.text: Jun,7. Former speaker of Poland Parlament offered to give a nuclear weapon to Ukraine.
May,18. Finland and Sweden simultaneously handed in their official letters of application to join NATO
April,20. Russia tested new ballistic missile
Feb,19. Zelenkiy mentioned that Ukraine could reconsider its non-nuclear status at the Munich Security Conference.
Jan, 3.US, UK, Russia, France, and China adopted a joint statement to prevent a nuclear war.
